a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Number of recorded natural disaster events, 1900 to 2023
The number of global reported natural disaster events in any given year. Note that this largely reflects
increases in data reporting, and should not be used to assess the total number of events.
Note: Data includes disasters recorded up to April 2024.
